author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter shower corner waterproofing tips…I apply ALL-SET with a 3 inch joint compound knife then use the KERDI trowel. Then I embed KERDI-BAND so that it’s equidistant on both walls. The final step is to make the banding flat with a joint compound knife and wipe off excess mortar. Many thanks to @schlutersystemsna for sponsoring this tutorial 🔥#schlutersystems #showerremodel #bathroomremodel #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: Schluter Shower Corner Waterproofing Tips - #shorts #schlutersystems #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
